relation: Campus often runs events, has movie screenings, or other things. Off-campus there's not much to do unless you want to drive to Savannah or Charleston.
Wide selection of pretty okay food. Sometimes they offer something great, and sometimes it can be bad, but there's always a salad bar.
I commute so I can't really say anything.
I don't know if the work is so much challenging as it is time-consuming. Almost all of my classes involve a lot of reading and the preferred assignment is paper-writing.

If you see a class you think is interesting offered in the schedule, take it, because there's a good chance you will have to wait a while before it is offered again. Also, be aware that many class sizes are small.

USCB has a welcoming and excellent staff. Though it has limited course offerings, sometimes there are some really great ones. They are always trying to create events for the students to participate in, so there is usually something going on.
pageTitle: University of South Carolina-Beaufort Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
